name: Ash Battle
description:
Ash Battle is a Sci-Fi minimalist survival game with a Bullet Hell style.
Ash is on an unknown planet and has found many enemies who didn't like his visit. Prepare yourself and be ready for battle, because they come in huge numbers.

Goals:
Try to survive the large amount of enemies, they will chase you wherever you go. You will not be able to escape them.


Weapons
Use your sword and your weapon to fight your enemies, each of them has a special ability that you can take advantages


Map
Use a map to navigate and evade your enemies if you can!


Rank
Get points with each game and try to overcome your limits.


Boss
Face the most powerful enemy on this inhospitable planet and try to defeat him.
